name: The Pack (itch) (Jimanzium)
description:
Put yourself into the shoes of a high-class hit-man.

You have been invited for a special meeting with the leader of the sophisticated organisation that you have been providing services for. 

Be prepared to receive an offer that you just can't refuse.

Features:

  • Dive into an action packed side scrolling shooter
  • Short 1 - 2 hours running length
  • Unique twisted story
  • A refreshing blend of genres

Will you ever escape this nightmare?

Default Controls:

Keyboard:

Arrow keys to move and navigate menus

Z to shoot and select menu option

X to dive and go back on a menu

Escape to pause

Gamepad:

Dpad to move and navigate menus

A to shoot and select menu option

B to dive and go back on a menu

Start to pause

Purchase the fantastic full high quality soundtrack  created by Dave Young on their Bandcamp page: https://johndavidyoung.bandcamp.com/album/the-pack-ost
